name: Nowcast Module
description: Gets the probability of seeing an aurora in a given location
notes: **If `date` is null, then there is no probability data for that location**

parameters.description: Latitude for the location you wish to obtain the probability for
Longitude for the location you wish to obtain the probability for

If set, will get the highest probability for the given area *plus* this distance. If [Format Options](/v2/formats) are set to imperial, give the distance as miles. Otherwise, give the distance as kilometers

returns.description: The chance you have, as a percentage, of seeing an aurora directly overhead
The distance from the location you provided. If [Format Options](/v2/formats) are set to imperial, this will be in miles. Otherwise, it'll be set to kilometers

demo.name: Get probability for Fairbanks, Alaska
demo.description: This will also search within a 1000km radius of the specified location

demo.name: Get the probability for 0, 0
demo.description: This will have no value available, so `distance` and `date` will be null
